column5: to get your order in to Sirmanski Lures. Lets support one of our own. https://www.sirmanski.com/index.aspx I am not affiliated, but I did stay in a Holiday Inn Express last night.

I have used Mike's jigs and crankbaits for year's. Great jigs for sure. Mike responded to a Share a Seat post and we put his jigs to the test on Red Lake! Great guy to fish with, he made our group a Red Lake Special jig package for last year's trip. Again those jigs worked great! Give email a try!
Thanks, Bill... They look good. I put it on my "faves" list....
I ordered some Walleye Candy, some pink stand ups and a crank assortment. Ya just can't have enough.......
